name: Sherpa Software Development
overview:
Sherpa Software Development brings together secure software development with solid business development practices. Instead of strictly selling a consultant, Sherpa Software Development becomes a partner - walking with the customer step by step. As a result, we have a vested interest in your success, because we are both in this together.

Those on the Sherpa Software Development staff have produced enterpise products and support for a vast array of government clients, as well as simple support services for small mom-and-pop businesses.

Sherpa Software Development focuses on the following technologies: Adobe, Cold Fusion, PhP, MicroSoft SQL Server, Oracle Database, MySQL and many more.

external_links.title: Biztag.com Entrepreneur Interview with Mike Greider of Sherpa Software Development, LLC
